get.description: Returns all available filter options that can be used in the route library. Respects user visibility permissions - authenticated users see their own routes plus public and crew-visible routes, while unauthenticated users only see public routes.

regions.description: List of unique region values from available routes

difficulties.description: List of unique difficulty levels from available routes

seasons.description: List of unique season values from available routes

available_days.description: List of unique duration days (duration_days > 0) from available routes, sorted ascending. Only includes routes visible to the user.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of available mental health therapists. You can filter by specialization, language, and minimum rating. Returns therapists that are approved and active.

biography.example: I am a licensed clinical psychologist with over 10 years of experience specializing in anxiety disorders, depression, and trauma. I work with maritime professionals to help them manage the unique challenges of life at sea.

data.biography: I am a licensed clinical psychologist with over 10 years of experience...

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving therapists

get.summary: Get available filter options for therapists
get.description: Returns all available filter options including specializations, languages, and price ranges for filtering therapists.
Retrieve comprehensive detailed information about a specific therapist including credentials, availability, pricing, and reviews summary.

biography.example: I am a licensed clinical psychologist with over 10 years of experience specializing in anxiety disorders, depression, and trauma. I work with maritime professionals to help them manage the unique challenges of life at sea.

sliding_scale_available.description: Whether sliding scale pricing is available

professional_philosophy.example: I believe in a client-centered approach that empowers individuals to discover their own strengths and resilience.

data.biography: I am a licensed clinical psychologist with over 10 years of experience...

get.description: Get available time slots for a therapist. If no date is provided, returns availability for the next 7 days. Time slots are returned in the therapist's timezone.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Specific date to check availability (YYYY-MM-DD). If not provided, returns next 7 days.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Filter by session duration in minutes (30, 60, 90)

session_types.description: Available session types for this slot

time_slots.description: Available time slots for this date

post.description: Book a therapy session with a therapist. You can book a single session or set up a recurring series. The system will check availability and calculate pricing based on session type and duration. Payment will be processed if credits are available, otherwise a payment link will be provided.

therapist_id.description: ID of the therapist to book with

scheduled_at.description: Session date and time in ISO 8601 format with timezone. Must be a future date/time.

session_type.description: Type of session: 'video' for video call, 'phone' for phone call, 'in-person' for in-person meeting

duration_minutes.description: Session duration in minutes. Common options: 30, 60, or 90 minutes.

timezone.description: Timezone for the session (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'UTC'). If not provided, uses therapist's timezone.

is_recurring.description: Whether this is a recurring session series

recurring_frequency.description: Frequency of recurring sessions. Required if is_recurring is true.

recurring_end_date.description: End date for recurring sessions. Required if is_recurring is true.

recurring_session_count.description: Total number of sessions in the recurring series. Alternative to recurring_end_date.

user_notes.example: I'd like to focus on anxiety management and coping strategies for work-related stress.
user_notes.description: Optional notes for the therapist about what you'd like to discuss or focus on

use_credits.description: Whether to use available mental health credits for payment

example.user_notes: I'd like to focus on anxiety management and coping strategies for work-related stress.

session_cost.description: Total cost of the session in USD

payment_link.description: Payment link if payment is required

is_recurring.description: Whether this is part of a recurring series

video_link.description: Video call link (provided closer to session time)

400.description: Invalid request or slot not available

message.example: The selected time slot is not available. Please choose another time.

scheduled_at: The selected time slot is already booked.
The scheduled_at must be a future date and time.
duration_minutes: The duration must be 30, 60, or 90 minutes.

message.example: An error occurred while booking the session

get.description: Retrieve all sessions booked by the authenticated user
Get detailed information about a specific session

Retrieve a paginated list of mental health resources including articles, videos, guides, and tools. Resources are filtered to show only published content. You can filter by category and resource type.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter resources by title or description

title.example: Managing Stress at Sea: A Comprehensive Guide

description.example: Learn effective strategies for managing stress while working on yachts and dealing with the unique challenges of maritime life.

is_favorited.description: Whether the authenticated user has favorited this resource (only if authenticated)

data.title: Managing Stress at Sea: A Comprehensive Guide
data.description: Learn effective strategies for managing stress while working on yachts and dealing with the unique challenges of maritime life.
data.author: Dr. Sarah Johnson

data.title: Mindfulness Meditation for Seafarers
data.description: A 10-minute guided meditation specifically designed for maritime professionals.
data.author: Dr. Michael Chen

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving resources

get.description: Get detailed information about a mental health resource

post.description: Add a resource to favorites

get.description: Retrieve mood tracking entries for the authenticated user. Returns entries sorted by date (newest first). Can be filtered by date range. Useful for tracking mood trends over time.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for filtering entries (YYYY-MM-DD). If not provided, defaults to 30 days ago.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for filtering entries (YYYY-MM-DD). If not provided, defaults to today.

tracked_time.description: Exact timestamp when entry was created

mood_rating.description: Overall mood rating from 1 (very poor) to 10 (excellent)

energy_level.description: Energy level from 1 (very low) to 10 (very high)

stress_level.description: Stress level from 1 (very low) to 10 (very high)

trigger_notes.example: Had a productive day at work. Completed all tasks on time. Feeling accomplished.
trigger_notes.description: Notes about what may have influenced mood

is_quick_checkin.description: Whether this was a quick check-in (minimal data)

average_mood.description: Average mood rating for the period

data.trigger_notes: Had a productive day at work. Completed all tasks on time.
Long work day, didn't sleep well last night.

post.description: Create a new mood tracking entry. Track your daily mood, energy, sleep, and stress levels. Only mood_rating and tracked_date are required; all other fields are optional. You can create one entry per day.

tracked_date.description: Date of tracking (YYYY-MM-DD). Can be today or a past date, but not future dates.

mood_rating.description: Overall mood rating from 1 (very poor) to 10 (excellent). Required field.

energy_level.description: Energy level from 1 (very low/exhausted) to 10 (very high/energetic)

sleep_quality.description: Sleep quality from previous night: 1 (very poor) to 10 (excellent)

stress_level.description: Current stress level from 1 (very low) to 10 (very high)

medications.description: Medications taken today (if you want to track this)

trigger_notes.example: Had a good day at work. Completed all tasks on time. Feeling accomplished and productive.
trigger_notes.description: Notes about what may have influenced your mood today (positive or negative triggers)

is_quick_checkin.description: Whether this is a quick check-in with minimal data. If true, only mood_rating is required.

example.trigger_notes: Had a productive day at work. Completed all tasks on time. Feeling accomplished.

data.trigger_notes: Had a productive day at work.

400.description: Entry already exists for this date

message.example: An entry already exists for this date. Use PUT to update it.

mood_rating: The mood rating must be between 1 and 10.
tracked_date: The tracked date cannot be in the future.

message.example: An error occurred while creating the entry

put.description: Update an existing mood tracking entry

get.description: Get comprehensive overview data for the mental health dashboard. Returns upcoming sessions, recent mood entries, active goals, recommended resources, mood trends, and statistics. This endpoint provides all the data needed to display a user's mental health dashboard.

active_goals.description: Number of active mental health goals

average_mood_7_days.description: Average mood rating over last 7 days

average_mood_30_days.description: Average mood rating over last 30 days

daily_entries.description: Daily mood data for charting (last 30 days)

suggested_resources.description: Resources recommended based on user activity

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving dashboard data

description.example: Leading provider of maritime safety training

logo_url.description: Full URL to provider logo (base URL from APP_URL + /storage/ + logo path)

logo_url.description: Full URL to provider logo (base URL from APP_URL environment variable + /storage/ + logo path)

image_url.description: Full URL to gallery image (base URL from APP_URL environment variable + /storage/ + image_path)

cover_image_url.description: Full URL to certification cover image (base URL from APP_URL + /storage/ + cover_image path)

logo_url.description: Full URL to provider logo (base URL from APP_URL + /storage/ + logo path)

profile_photo_url.description: Full URL to user profile photo (base URL from APP_URL + /storage/ + profile_photo_path)

get.description: Returns list of all available certifications.
Returns list of all certification categories with counts.
Returns upcoming course schedules with filtering options. Only shows future dates that are not cancelled or full.
Returns all available filter options for training courses including categories, certifications, formats, countries, and price range. Use this endpoint to populate filter dropdowns in your UI.

certifications.description: List of all certifications with their category

price_range.description: Min and max price range for courses

get.description: Returns paginated list of published job posts with filtering and sorting options. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Filter by position title or level

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in position title, description, or location

post.description: Creates a new job post. Requires authentication. Supports both permanent and temporary work positions.

about_position.example: We are looking for an experienced Captain...

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific job post. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

about_position.example: We are looking for an experienced Captain...

put.description: Updates an existing job post. Requires authentication and ownership.

delete.description: Deletes a job post. Requires authentication and ownership.

post.description: Submit an application for a job post. Requires authentication. Calculates match score automatically.

cover_message.example: I am very interested in this position...

attached_documents.description: Array of document IDs from career history

get.description: Returns list of applications for a specific job post. Requires authentication and ownership of the job post.
Returns list of job applications submitted by the authenticated user.
Returns detailed information about a specific job application.

put.description: Updates the status of a job application. Requires authentication and ownership of the job post.

post.description: Withdraws a job application. Requires authentication and ownership of the application.
Saves a job post to the user's saved jobs list. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Removes a job post from the user's saved jobs list. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns list of job posts saved by the authenticated user.

post.description: Publishes a job post, making it visible to all users. Requires authentication and ownership.
Marks a job post as filled, indicating the position has been filled. Requires authentication and ownership.

200.description: Job post marked as filled successfully

message.example: Job post marked as filled successfully

get.description: Returns messages/conversations related to a job post. Requires authentication.

post.summary: Send a message for a job
post.description: Sends a message related to a job post or application. Requires authentication.

message.example: Thank you for your application. We would like to schedule an interview.

get.description: Returns ratings and reviews for a job post or booking. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job post ID or Booking ID

comment.example: Excellent experience working with this crew

post.summary: Submit a rating for a job
post.description: Submits a rating and review for a job post or booking. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Job post ID or Booking ID

comment.example: Excellent experience working with this crew

bearerAuth.description: Enter your token in the format: Bearer {token}
